trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Naugatuck
There were no other sightings in Naugatuck on or around September 20th 2011
divs: sighting detailsmy husband and i were having a bon-fire when i looked up at the sky as i often do when i saw two clouds that should have been linked together and thought that was strange. hen a mist\light shined down in a cone shape and i begged my husband to look up "for the love of god look up" i said. he saw it too and was amazed. 2 minutes of looking at this light and it disappeared as quickly as it came. i couldn't shake the feeling something\one was behind me. my dog wouldn't stop looking into the woods. i was scared. the following week i had a dream or what i thought was a dream, it was the cloud in reverse. i awoke at the back door looking up. i closed the door and locked it thinking i was safe. a year later i feel something on my neck, it feels like dried skin, i pick at it for days until i finally get twezzers and pull. something, white plastic about 1\2 inch long, cone shaped, comes out of my neck! before i can look at it close, i drop it on the floor never to be seen again. i believe, i've always believed. i just believed that it would happen to other people, not me. so much for that.
Summary: Cone shaped cloud/mist coming from sky where there should have been clouds
